name: Muramasa Rebirth Complete Collection
summary:
Like the name says, 'Muramasa Rebirth: Complete Collection' brings together the original game and all four of the 'Genroku Legends' into one convenient package! Experience the stories of the possessed princess Momohime and the fugitive ninja Kisuke, as well as those of Okoi, the demon-cat out to avenge her owner the downtrodden farmer Gonbe, who has taken it upon himself to ask the powers that be to re-think the taxes that are driving his village to ruin Arashimaru, a world-weary ninja on the run from his former clan and cursed by a vengeful goddess and Rajyaki, the youngest daughter of the ruler of Hell, who is on a mission to find the treasures belonging to the Seven Gods of Fortune while trying to be the best fiancee she can be!
With beautiful, hand-drawn 2-D art, intense hack-and slash game play, and epics tales of betrayal, vengeance, hope, and redemption, 'Muramasa Rebirth: Complete Collection' is a must-have for the PlayStationVita handheld entertainment system!
